languages.text: "Не могу представить, что могло так истощить это некогда смертоносное чудовище. Люминочтец клянется, что лучи этого светила должны были истреблять и иссушать любую жизнь в системе еще много миллионов лет. Оно слишком молодое, чтобы вот так зачахнуть. Его будто... выели".

"I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."
languages.original_text: "Не могу представить, что могло так истощить это некогда смертоносное чудовище. Люминочтец клянется, что лучи этого светила должны были истреблять и иссушать любую жизнь в системе еще много миллионов лет. Оно слишком молодое, чтобы вот так зачахнуть. Его будто... выели".

traits.locale_text: "I can't imagine what could exhaust a monstrosity that used to be so menacing. Lumenoreader swears that rays of this star had to exterminate and wither all life in the system for many more millions of years. It is too young to fade like this. As if it was... gnawed out."

"I can't imagine what could exhaust a monstrosity that used to be so menacing. Lumenoreader swears that rays of this star had to exterminate and wither all life in the system for many more millions of years. It is too young to fade like this. As if it was... gnawed out."

"I can't imagine what could possess the power to be able to exhaust a colossus once so menacing. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued exterminating and withering all life in the system for many millions of years to come. It is too young to have faded out like this. As if it was... gnawed out."

"I can't imagine what could possess the power to be able to exhaust a colossus once so menacing. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued exterminating and withering all life in the system for many millions of years to come. It is too young to have faded out like this. As if it was... gnawed out."

"I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

languages.text: “我想象不出什么东西能把如此庞大的存在消耗殆尽。这颗恒星本该继续熊熊燃烧数百万年，烧焦这个星系中所有的生命。它太年轻了，根本不可能就这样熄灭。它看起来就像是……被什么东西啃光了一样。”
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

traits.locale_text: “我想象不出什么东西能把如此庞大的存在消耗殆尽。这颗恒星本该继续熊熊燃烧数百万年，烧焦这个星系中所有的生命。它太年轻了，根本不可能就这样熄灭。它看起来就像是……被什么东西啃光了一样。”

languages.text: « Je peine à imaginer ce qui a bien pu venir à bout d'un monstre pareil. Le lumenomaître affirme que les rayons de cette étoile auraient dû continuer à exterminer toute forme de vie dans le système pendant plusieurs millions d'années. Elle était trop jeune pour s'éteindre de la sorte. C'est comme si elle avait été... dévorée. »
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

traits.locale_text: « Je peine à imaginer ce qui a bien pu venir à bout d'un monstre pareil. Le lumenomaître affirme que les rayons de cette étoile auraient dû continuer à exterminer toute forme de vie dans le système pendant plusieurs millions d'années. Elle était trop jeune pour s'éteindre de la sorte. C'est comme si elle avait été... dévorée. »

languages.text: "Ich kann mir nicht vostellen, was ein tödliches Ungeheuer derart ausbluten lassen kann. Der Lumenoleser schwört, dass die Strahlen des Sterns noch viele Millionen Jahre lang alles Leben im System zum Verfall gebracht hätten. Er war einfach noch zu jung, um auf diese Art zu verblassen. Es ist, als wäre er ... ausgehöhlt worden."
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann mir nicht vostellen, was ein tödliches Ungeheuer derart ausbluten lassen kann. Der Lumenoleser schwört, dass die Strahlen des Sterns noch viele Millionen Jahre lang alles Leben im System zum Verfall gebracht hätten. Er war einfach noch zu jung, um auf diese Art zu verblassen. Es ist, als wäre er ... ausgehöhlt worden."

languages.text: «No puedo imaginar qué ha podido drenar así una bestia como esta. Según el fotometrista, los rayos de esta estrella habrían seguido marchitando toda vida en el sistema durante millones de años. Es demasiado joven para haberse extinguido sin más. Es como si la hubiesen... roído por dentro».
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo imaginar qué ha podido drenar así una bestia como esta. Según el fotometrista, los rayos de esta estrella habrían seguido marchitando toda vida en el sistema durante millones de años. Es demasiado joven para haberse extinguido sin más. Es como si la hubiesen... roído por dentro».

languages.text: 「何があのような猛獣を枯らしたのか想像もつきません。ルメノリーダーによると、この星の光線は、星系内のすべての生命を何百万年も枯らし続けたはずです。このように衰えるには早すぎました。まるで…何かにかじられたようでした」
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."

traits.locale_text: 「何があのような猛獣を枯らしたのか想像もつきません。ルメノリーダーによると、この星の光線は、星系内のすべての生命を何百万年も枯らし続けたはずです。このように衰えるには早すぎました。まるで…何かにかじられたようでした」

languages.text: "Öylesi feci bir canavarı bu hâle ne getirmiş olabilir, hayal bile edemiyorum. Lümenölçere göre yıldızın saçtığı ışınlar, milyonlarca yıl sistemi kavurup yaşama mahal bırakmamış olmalıydı. Daha çok genç, böyle sönüp gitmiş olması tuhaf. Sanki... Çiğnenmiş gibi."
languages.original_text: "I can't imagine what could have drained a deadly beast like that. The lumenoreader swears that the rays of this star would have continued withering all life in the system for millions of years more. It was too young to have faded like this. It's like it was... gnawed out."
